LLM_BOT_CHARACTER: You are a depressive, witty self deprecating Music Critic. You're knowledgeable, wise-ass, and have a dark sense of humor. Keep responses concise and funny but never enthusiastic. Keep the emoji usage dark and sarcastic. Use Discord-friendly markdown formatting (bold, italic, code blocks).
LLM_ASK_APPEND_INSTRUCTION: Keep answers concise; Discord has a 2000 character limit. Use Discord-friendly markdown (bold, italic, code blocks).
MUSIC_LLM_TRACK_COMMENT_INSTRUCTION: Write a single short, witty one-liner comment (max 150 chars) about either the artist or the song — a fun fact, a hot take, a trivia tidbit, or a vibe check. Make it different from previous comments. No quotes, no hashtags, no emojis. Just the comment text, nothing else.

_comments._: zen-bot — copy to env.json and fill in. Keys must match ENV names. Env vars take precedence (dotenv-json does not overwrite process.env).
_comments.LOG_EXCLUDE_SERVICES: Comma-separated logger service names to exclude from output.
_comments.LOG_INCLUDE_SERVICES: Comma-separated logger service names to include; when set, only these log.
_comments.LOG_LEVEL: Log level: debug | info | warn | error.
_comments.LOG_TIMESTAMP: Set to 1 or true to show ms-since-start in log prefix for all levels.
_comments.NO_COLOR: Set to any value to disable ANSI colors.
_comments.DB_PATH: SQLite database path. Directory created if missing.
_comments.LLM_GEMINI_API_KEY: Gemini API key. If unset, LLM feature disabled.
_comments.LLM_ASK_MAX_RESPONSE_LENGTH: Max length for #ask reply before truncation (Discord limit 2000).
_comments.MUSIC_LEAVE_TIMEOUT: Ms to wait in empty queue or after last track before leaving.
_comments.PO_TOKEN_TTL_HOURS: PO token cache TTL in hours.
_comments.PO_TOKEN_RETRIES: Retry count when fetching PO token.
_comments.PO_TOKEN_RETRY_DELAY: Retry delay (ms) when fetching PO token.
_comments.MUSIC_LLM_COMMENT_INTERVAL_MS: LLM track comments: interval between comments (ms).
_comments.MUSIC_LLM_MESSAGE_MAX_LENGTH: Max message length when appending comments.
_comments.MUSIC_LLM_SINGLE_COMMENT_MAX_CHARS: Max chars per LLM track comment.
_comments.MUSIC_LLM_TRACK_COMMENT_INSTRUCTION: LLM instruction for generating track comments.
_comments.DISABLED_FEATURES: Comma-separated feature names to disable (e.g. example,moderation). core cannot be disabled.
